meaning_str.bing:
v. 建议；通知；劝告；忠告
网络. 告知；劝说；通告

建议；忠告；劝告；推荐；通知；告知；忠告；出主意；正式告知；警告；顾问；向…提供咨询服务

sogou-kaoyan.v: 建议; 劝告[出现5次)];通知; 正式告知[出现1次)]

sogou-CET6.v: 建议; 出主意[出现7次)]

sogou-CET4.v: 建议; 出主意[出现21次)];通知; 告知[出现1次)]

sogou-gaokao.v: 建议; 出主意[出现3次)]

sogou-zhongkao.vt: 劝告; 忠告; 建议[出现69次)]

1.en: You can certainly get the money back. But when coming to think of the devil to pay, I advise you to give it up.
1.cn: 你可以把那笔钱要回来，考虑到今后的麻烦，我劝你不要的好。

2.en: Very often they will give you some valuable wisdom, or advise you, completely free of charge, about what you could have done better.
2.cn: 他们通常会给你富含价值的信息，并且这是完全免费的。这些建议可以让你把网站改进的更好。

3.en: Please advise how much you would charge.

0.en: Is it time? It is. Father, but I did not advise your attendance.
0.cn: 到时候了吗？是的。父皇，但是我不建议您出席。

1.en: So, Cary did not advise you to break the law? We were telling stories, that's all.
1.cn: 凯里没有就如何违法给你们建议吗？我们在讲故事，就是这样。

2.en: We will use our air power. We will train and equip our partners. We will advise and we will assist.
2.cn: 我们将继续利用空中优势，为盟国提供装备和人员培训，提供情报和咨询建议。

3.en: Do you advise I send warriors in search of a myth when our true and very real enemy lies in Xiangyang?
3.cn: 你是在建议我派兵搜寻一群虚构的人吗？我们真正的敌人明明在襄阳好好待着呢。

4.en: Well, you're here to advise the landowners on how to get through this crisis, aren't you? To save the estates that need saving.
4.cn: 你们是来给庄园主们建议，教他们如何度过难关的，对吧？帮助他们保住庄园。

5.en: Can I give you a little advise about the villagers, Belle? They're never gonna trust the kind of change you're trying to bring them.
5.cn: 我可以给你一点关于村民们的建议,贝儿？他们永远都不会接受你想要引发的变革。

6.en: The court would advise you to make it quick, as the court had a dicey looking breakfast burrito this morning and just took an Imodium.
6.cn: 法官会建议你简短点，因为法官早上吃了可能馊了的玉米煎饼，而且刚吃了易蒙停(止泻药)。

7.en: But I helped advise on a lot of cases. On your husband's cases?
7.cn: 但是我给很多案件提供过意见。你丈夫办理的案件吗？

8.en: Dear Mr. Humphrey, we are pleased to advise you that we would like to publish your short story in our summer fiction issue featuring '20 under 20.
8.cn: 亲爱的汉弗瑞先生，我们很高兴的通知你，我们想要把你的短篇小说出版在我们的夏季年轻才俊小说专题当中。
